mapper.update: update th_notice_assess set noticeId = #{noticeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, noticeType = #{noticetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parsCount = #{parscount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, noticeId, userName, content, `level`, createTime, deleted, `type`, noticeType, parsCount from th_notice_assess where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, noticeId, userName, content, `level`, createTime, deleted, `type`, noticeType, parsCount from th_notice_assess
